title: Social Media-Enabled Hybrid Social Studies Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Core knowledge of secondary social studies curriculum and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing social studies lessons using social media tools for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply educational utilization strategies for social media platforms to actual classroom scenarios
Learners can design social media techniques that promote peer collaboration and interaction in blended learning environments
Learners can complete project-based assessment tasks using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
